summary: This is a brief email forwarding an article that describes comments by Counsel to the Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York. It appears to be internal communication about media coverage related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Ilan Graff
persons.role: Counsel to the Acting U.S. Attorney
persons.context: Mentioned in the email subject line as the recipient of the correspondence; his office affiliation (USANYS - U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York) is noted.

events.title: Email forwarding article about SDNY counsel comments
events.description: An email was sent forwarding an article that describes comments made by Counsel to the Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 10, 2020.
The email forwards an article describing comments by Counsel to the Acting U.S. Attorney for the SDNY.
The recipient is Ilan Graff of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The communication indicates ongoing media attention and legal activity related to the Epstein case in late 2020.
